scripts.start: concurrently -k -s first "node --env-file=backend/.env backend/src/server.js" "cd frontend && npx vite --port 7595"
scripts.dev: concurrently -k "cd backend && npm run dev" "cd frontend && npm run dev"
scripts.install-all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.clean: cd backend && npm run clean && cd ../frontend && npm run clean
